data.text:
It was great being back at Bonnington for the fourth time. 
I get reminded each time I arrive why I picked this spot - it is our go to while in Dubai.

Service at this 5 star hotel is top. The staff is super friendly and helpful in every way.
Breakfast buffé is rich and delicious as always.

Thanks so much to our friend at the front desk Mr Rahid for facilitating our check-in process and for being available at all times.

Many thanks to all other staff Stephen, Joelar, Vikas, Sayf (at the breakfast) and the lovely lady at the front desk which name I forgot.

Thanks so the gentlemen at the entrance helping out with taxis and luggage.

Thanks so much also to Carlos who always help us get the best offers.

Can't wait to come back in the near future.
data.title: Our place while in Dubai

user_location.name: Gothenburg, Vastra Gotaland County, West Coast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience! We're delighted to hear that you had an exceptional experience in voco bonnington. I'm glad to hear that the service exceeded your expectations and that Rahid, Stephen, Joelar, Vikas, Sayf and the other staff members made your stay memorable. It's wonderful to know that everyone went above and beyond to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.

I'll make sure to pass along your kind words to all including Carlos, who assisted you in getting the best offers. I'm sure they'll be delighted to hear about your positive experience.

Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Kind Regards,
Giacomo Puntel
General Manager
owner_response.author: voco Bonnington Management

data.text: Great Hotel. Exceptionally clean and provides all the amenities you need. Staff very friendly and accommodating. Most hotels fail in small things but not this hotel - great shower, strong wifi, plenty of sockets, decent gym etc However the best thing was the breakfast buffet and food. The buffet had everything you could think of, including real honey comb, freshly made pancakes,  and healthy shots. Quality of food was unreal.
data.title: Lovely Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience! We're delighted to hear that you had a comfortable and memorable stay.
We take pride in maintaining exceptional standards across various aspects, encompassing cleanliness, shower facilities, availability of sockets, gym amenities and connectivity.

It brings us immense satisfaction to hear that you enjoyed the quality and variety of our breakfast buffet. Our freshly prepared pancakes and authentic honeycomb undoubtedly added to your overall experience.

Thank you once again for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Kind Regards,
Giacomo Puntel
General Manager
owner_response.author: voco Bonnington Management

data.text: One of the best Ladies nights I’ve ever experienced. Our waiter, Kushan, was AMAZING! So friendly, such good customer service. He was also so funny. Thank you for taking care of me and my friends for my birthday. Thank you Cheeky Camel! Dubai folks should definitely check it out.
data.title: Best Ladies Night! Thank you Kushan for your hospitality.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear S7641VBstephanieg,

Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We appreciate your loyalty and continued patronage at our hotel. 
We appreciate the support you provide and will pass along your encouraging words with Kushan. 

For more and future celebrations we a delighted to assist and celebrate with you and your friends.
Feel free to visit and follow our social media page to be updated on any upcoming promotions.

We make every effort to provide outstanding service to all of our guests, even our regulars like you.

Sincerely,

Kristel Jaine
Front Office Executive
owner_response.author: voco Bonnington Management

data.text:
Lovely chill place. Their rooftop area during the winter was really nice. Our server Kushan was really helpful and sweet. Super attentive to all our orders and very friendly too!
We went for their ladies night offer on Friday and totally worth it!
data.title: Chill vibes!

owner_response.title: Owner response

Thank you for your kind feedback and recommendation of our hotel to other travelers. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit and dine at Cheeky Camel. Your appreciation is much appreciated and will be shared with Farhan. 

 We hope to be of service to you shortly.

Feel free to visit and follow our social media page to be updated on any upcoming promotions.

Sincerely,

data.text: Kushan  and Farhan is the best waiter, so hospitable and kind. Such a great experience - best customer service. Fab place to go with friends and relax. Kushan really made the experience worth remembering. Cheeky camel is a vibe!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
data.title: Best Waiter
